subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Columbian Nairo Quintana rode to a superb solo win in the toughest stage of the Criterium du Dauphine on Saturday while Britain’s Bradley Wiggins moved a step closer to a second successive overall race victory.
snippet: Columbian Nairo Quintana rode to a superb solo win in the toughest stage of the Criterium du Dauphine on Saturday while Britain’s Bradley Wiggins moved a step closer to a second successive overall race victory.
